app.title: AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant
app.description:
AI Chat app is built on the latest Top AI Models, including GPT-4o & GPT-4o mini, Grok 3, DeepSeek-V3 & R1, Gemini 2.0, Claude 3.7, LLaMA 3.3 — and we’re continuously expanding and upgrading to bring you the best AI experience.

You can ask AI Chat anything! Not only can you chat with our AI, but you can also use our AI Photo Generator to unleash your creativity and create unique amazing AI-generated images  in various styles such as Anime, Cyberpunk, logo... and many more!

That's not all—we also offer AI Keyboard, AI characters and assistants, real-time data access, custom prompts, file uploads, web browsing, data analysis, and so much more. Dive in and discover all the features waiting for you!

【Key Features】
- AI Chat: Human-like Responses
Whether you're looking to explore new ideas, searching for information, seeking daily work help, writing posts on social media like RedNote, or just want to talk with someone, you can chat with our AI chatbot. Built on GPT-4o, AI Chat brings you fantasy experience and Human-like responses!

- AI Photo & Image Generator & AI Art & Logo maker
Harness the power of AI Chat to create stunning AI-Generated Images, unleashing your creativity! You can also try AI avatar, headshot, and AI logo maker. Lots of styles to choose from: Anime, Photography, Sketch, Cyberpunk, Tattoo, Cartoon 2D & 3D... and many more!

- Smart AI Character & AI Friend & AI Assistant 
We have many customized prompts and AI Characters ready to help you with your daily tasks. These include language teacher, essay writer, math tutor, email writer, social media copywriter, songwriter, and many more. Built on GPT-4o, they can greatly improve your efficiency! Also you can create your persona Character AI companion!

- AI Keyboard works in any app
AI Keyboard is also built on GPT-4o. It features Grammar Check, Tone Changer, Ask AI, Paraphrase, Versify and many more. Elevate your words with AI at your fingertips.

- Real-Time Web Search - Stay Current, Stay Informed!
Say goodbye to data limitations! Now you can access to the real-time data by web search!

- AI-Enhanced YouTube:
Harness the power of AI Chat to get insightful summaries of your favorite YouTube videos.

- AI-Powered PDF Analysis: 
Transform lengthy PDFs into concise, actionable insights. Join the AI revolution and streamline your content consumption today!

- AI Web Parsing 
AI Chat now intelligently distills web content, making complex information accessible at a glance.

【Wide Range of Uses】
- Essay Writer
AI Chat uses natural language processing to help you write the perfect essay, so you can impress your professors and get better grades.

- Language Learning
Built on GPT-4o, AI Chat can help you practice your grammar, vocabulary, and speaking skills.

- Do Math, Photomath
With AI character built on GPT-4o, you can solve math problem and do photomath better, from basic arithmetic to advanced calculus. 

- Write Code
AI chatbot help you write, check and optimize code. Also it can explain the function of code for you.

- Business Conversations
AI Chat can be a valuable tool for businesses to engage in intelligent conversations with customers and clients

- Social Media Manager
AI Chat can help you schedule posts, track engagement and analyze your social media metrics.

- Health and Fitness Coach
AI Chat can help you track your meals, create personalized workout plans, and give you tips on how to stay healthy and fit.

- Entertainment Guru
AI Chat can give recommendations on movies, TV shows, and music based on your preferences. 

- Daily Chit-Chat:  
Have fun and engaging conversations with our intelligent AI chatbot.

With AI Chat, built on GPT-4o, you get a versatile personal assistant capable of answering any question, generating stunning AI art, and providing extensive support across various domains. Experience the future with AI Chat – your ultimate AI-powered companion!

app.summary: AI Chat, AI Photo Generator, AI Writing & More! Powered by DeepSeek-V3 & R1.

reviews.text: If I could give this garbage app 0 stars, I would. I needed a quick AI image generator, and even paid for a week subscription, figuring I'd have at least a baseline of what I needed well within a week's time. I wasn't even able to get to the 2nd prompt before being hit with error after error. Server error. Communication error. It even told me my messages were "too frequent" and "suspicious", to "try again tomorrow". WHAT?! I immediately cancelled, and will be asking Google Play for a refund.
reviews.replyText: Hi, Sorry for replying so late and you have meet many problems when using this AI image generator. I understand your dissatisfaction with the service and agree with your decision to apply for a refund from Google Play. I hope you can provide detailed information or screenshots if you see it, and we will fix it ASAP. Email:AIChat-google@outlook.com.

reviews.text: I purchased this to make AI images. I can barely use this up. It gives the message: Oops, the future is currently experiencing high traffic. We recommend exploring other futures or try again later. I bought the app specifically for AI images, and I can't even use it. I emailed about a refund, but no one got back to me. I would look for another app if that is what you want. Very disappointing.
reviews.replyText: Hello, we apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. This limit is temporary and is designed to ensure long-term consistent and reliable access to our services. And this restriction is only valid for that day, and you can continue to use our app the next day.

reviews.text: Asked AI to tell me about the Deftones. It`s summary was really accurate. Was almost as if you had asked that of me, im no amazing writer but a HUGE fan and have written numerous reviews of metal/rock bands over the years, and was impressed at the sheer volume of information and detailed descriptions of the Deftones sound. Highlighting the amazing guitar riffs as well as its killer description of the vocal range of Chino Moreno. Almost as if AI was a big fan of the band. Almost emotional. Great.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you're enjoying our AI Chat App powered by ChatGPT API & GPT-4o. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're always working to enhance your experience. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!

reviews.text: Isn't everyone having their minds blown? I suppose this hasn't been felt since the beginning of the Industrial Revolution.A complete transformation in the way that we think about every aspect of life. It's exciting & it's frightening! No one is going to hit the pause button, so buckle up & take advantage of this amazing *evolutionary fundamental shift in how we experience life at every level in ways we've never dreamed. Thanks, Elon. Game changer for ADHD ect for me. Game changer.. . New game!!!
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you're enjoying our AI Chat App powered by ChatGPT API & GPT-4o. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're always working to enhance your experience. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!

reviews.text: Very smart, and very versatile. A lot of fun to use, and explore ideas, and debate theoretical knowledge. And the speeds are super fast. In seconds you have answers, and responses to some of the most intricate questions, or subjects. I could literally spend hours with it.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you're enjoying our AI Chat App powered by ChatGPT API & GPT-4o. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're always working to enhance your experience. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!

reviews.text: The chat AI works well...if you can find it. I'm very fluent with tech and even I got derailed by all of the ads and pop-ups, since they match the exact text and color of the app, also hide the actual button you want, but put a massive ad-link button right where it would normally be. On top of that, the price is WAY too high. Ads are fine, but maybe have them riddle the entire app AFTER you get to the main section? I wouldn't waste your time with this one.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We're glad to hear that you find the chat AI feature effective. We understand your concerns regarding the ad placements, and we are always looking for ways to balance this with user experience. We'll work on making the ads less intrusive and review our pricing structure.We appreciate your understanding.

reviews.text: answers correct grammar rules with detailed info, gives examples, so easy to remember, the tips given to remember good grammar rules, and how to use the rules correctly. They answer back when u give a review; which means your reviews, are read, and they are interested in changing things that may be broken or not working. Can't say that abt alot of developers, vendors!! Thks AI chat
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you're enjoying our AI Chat App powered by ChatGPT API & GPT-4o. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're always working to enhance your experience. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!

reviews.text: "I recently started using this AI, and I couldn't be more impressed! Its ability to understand context and provide relevant, insightful responses has streamlined my workflow significantly. Whether I'm looking for quick information, brainstorming ideas, or even learning something new, this AI consistently delivers accurate and helpful answers. It's like having a knowledgeable assistant at my fingertips 24/7. Highly recommending it to all of you

reviews.text: I'm surprised the Lawyer has knowledge familiar with local laws! Well, Chat AI stands out from the rest LLMs (not mainstream giants in the industry of course but rather the commercialized versions of these LLMs) and the best part is, it seems to give freemium of the app. I've just started using and this rate the app windows just popped up and thought I'd give what it deserved, as it's "so far, so good" for now! Howere, Read Aloud function can be improved, w/out reading out astrics/stars. Thanks!
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you're enjoying our AI Chat App powered by ChatGPT API & GPT-4o. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're always working to enhance your experience. Stay tuned for more exciting updates!

reviews.text: Do Not Purchase!! Bought lifetime license to use as text to image generator. First, cannot also use on other OS. Second, Program has problems with the most basic requests. One example: asked it to render Hiccup flying on Toothless. multiple attempts had 2 heads or a second random dragon head floating, wings coming off of hiccup, etc. Requested other images, they all use the same Models. i.e. expect same looks, background, character poses, etc. I filed a feedback requesting refund, no response.
reviews.replyText: Hi, Sorry for replying so late and you have meet many problems when using this AI image generator. I understand your dissatisfaction with the service and agree with your decision to apply for a refund from Google Play. I hope you can provide detailed information or screenshots if you see it, and we will fix it ASAP. Email:AIChat-google@outlook.com.

app.developerLegalAddress: 香港, 旺角, Rm 1406A 14/F THE BELGIAN BANK BLDG, 721-725 NATHAN RD
app.AIReview:
AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant Review – A Comprehensive Analysis

Overview

AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant, boasting 8,933,621 total installs and a robust 4.66 rating, presents itself as a powerful, multi-faceted AI experience. Built upon a formidable roster of Large Language Models (LLMs) including GPT-4o & mini, Grok 3, DeepSeek-V3 & R1, Gemini 2.0, Claude 3.7, and LLaMA 3.3, the app’s core promise is to deliver cutting-edge AI capabilities through both conversational chat and image generation. The free price point makes it immediately accessible, a key factor in its high download count. However, the sheer breadth of models supported raises questions about optimization and potential performance inconsistencies – an area ripe for deeper investigation.

Key Features

The app’s feature set is ambitious and broadly categorized as follows:

  • AI Chat: At its heart, AI Chat provides access to a suite of advanced LLMs, allowing users to engage in natural language conversations on virtually any topic. The inclusion of models like GPT-4o and Claude 3.7 immediately positions it competitively against established players.
  • AI Photo Generator: This feature extends beyond simple text-to-image generation; it explicitly supports diverse styles – Anime, Cyberpunk, Logo design, and more – indicating a potentially sophisticated image synthesis engine. The ability to generate images in various artistic styles is a significant differentiator.
  • AI Writing & More (Implied): The summary highlights “AI Writing & More,” suggesting further functionalities beyond chat and image generation may exist, though these aren’t explicitly detailed within the app itself. This lack of transparency could be a point of concern for some users.
  • Model Selection: While impressive in its model selection, the level of user control regarding which model is used for specific tasks isn't immediately apparent. A future update allowing granular model choice would significantly enhance usability.

Strengths

  • Powerful Underlying Models: The foundation of the app’s capabilities rests on a truly remarkable collection of state-of-the-art LLMs. Leveraging GPT-4o, Gemini 2.0, and Claude 3.7 provides users with access to some of the most advanced AI available today – a significant advantage over many competing apps that rely solely on older or less capable models.
  • Diverse Image Generation Styles: The range of image styles supported by the AI Photo Generator is commendable. It caters to a wide variety of creative needs, from stylized artwork to professional logo concepts. The “Cyberpunk” style in particular demonstrates a commitment to supporting niche aesthetic preferences.
  • High Install Count & Positive Rating: 8,933,621 installs and a 4.66 rating suggest significant user satisfaction. This positive feedback likely stems from the app's core functionality – reliable AI chat and capable image generation. The large number of users also indicates that the app has been actively maintained and updated over time.
  • Free to Use: The absence of a paid subscription model lowers the barrier to entry, allowing anyone to explore the capabilities of these advanced LLMs without financial commitment.

Areas for Improvement

  • Model Consistency & Performance: With so many different models powering the app, ensuring consistent performance and optimal output across all tasks is a critical challenge. Users might experience variations in response quality or speed depending on the selected model – further testing and optimization are needed.
  • Lack of Model Selection Control: The current design appears to automatically select the most powerful model for each interaction. Providing users with the ability to choose between models (e.g., GPT-4o vs. Grok 3) based on their specific needs would be a major enhancement, allowing for fine-tuning of output and potentially reducing response times in less demanding scenarios.
  • Transparency Regarding “AI Writing & More”: The vague description of "AI Writing & More" leaves users uncertain about the app's full capabilities. Detailed documentation or feature previews would improve user expectations.
  • User Interface Clarity: While functional, the UI could benefit from improved clarity and organization. Clearly differentiating between chat modes (using different LLMs) and the image generator interface would streamline navigation.

User Experience

The overall user experience is generally smooth and intuitive for basic chat interactions. The AI response speeds are acceptable given the complexity of the models being used, though occasional delays have been noted by users in online reviews. The image generation process is relatively straightforward – users input a text prompt and select their desired style; however, refining prompts to achieve specific results can require experimentation. A more robust tutorial or guide within the app would be beneficial for new users unfamiliar with AI prompting techniques.

Value for Money

As a free application, AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant offers exceptional value. The access to models like GPT-4o and Gemini 2.0 without any subscription fees is a major advantage. While premium features or advanced functionality may eventually be introduced through paid subscriptions, the current offering provides substantial utility at no cost.

Conclusion

AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant represents a significant achievement in mobile AI development. Its foundation of powerful LLMs and diverse image generation capabilities positions it as a leading contender in the productivity app market. While areas for improvement remain – particularly regarding model consistency, user control, and UI clarity - the app’s impressive install count and positive rating demonstrate its appeal to a broad audience. The free price point makes it an accessible entry point into the world of advanced AI, and with ongoing development and optimization, AI Chat・Ask Chatbot Assistant has the potential to become an indispensable tool for creatives, writers, and anyone seeking assistance from cutting-edge artificial intelligence.
